BR_text.BRsummary: Unclear documentation on how to configure SSO
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h3>Unclear documentation</denchmark-h>
 
 <denchmark-link:https://docs.polyaxon.com/integrations/sso-gitlab/>This section</denchmark-link>
  describes how to configure GitLab SSO in the / file.
 <denchmark-h:h3>Missing Documentation</denchmark-h>
 
 There isn't an  section in <denchmark-link:https://docs.polyaxon.com/references/polyaxon-helm-reference/#how-to-set-the-configuration>the helm chart reference documentation</denchmark-link>
  and the  command says that such a key isn't recognized.
 There isn't any documentation describing how to configure AzureAD SSO in the config.yml file.

comments_0.comment_text: True, it's in the dashboard in the settings page, under auth.

comments_1.comment_text:
docs have been updated to reflect the new workflow to setup SSO with Gitlab.
 Thanks for reporting.
